talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>[Talk] Please give me information about Cristal Stream.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Dickinson${action:Talk}
There is a sudden increase of monsters here. We cannot control them anymore. The soldiers at Prairie Town were confident of wiping them out, but looking at the situation, we may need more support...

$Guard Dickinson$
Wind Forest is just beyond Cristal Stream. Calderock Village is nearby that area. You will need a pass to get through Cristal Stream on foot, so it's gonna be a mega feat.

$Guard Darcy$
A little help from you is a huge help to us all, young adventurer.
